title: COVID-19 coronavirus
description: Information and advice on the COVID-19 coronavirus for the community and businesses in Western Australia.
info: The WA Government has declared a State of Emergency for Western Australia. For updated details, including State of Emergency Declarations and Directions, visit COVID-19 coronavirus: State of Emergency Declarations

provided: Department of the Premier and Cabinet

title: Safer WA for Children and Young People
description: It's up to all of us
info:
The Western Australian Government apologises unreservedly for the sexual abuse of children in Western Australian Government institutions.

Safer WA for Children and Young People was developed as part of the Western Australian Government's implementation of the recommendations from the Royal Commission into Institutional Responses to Child Sexual Abuse.

subcategories.title: I'm worried about a child or young person
subcategories.description: Resources to help if you're worried a child is unsafe.

subcategories.title: Online Safety
subcategories.description: Information about keeping children and young people safe online.

subcategories.title: National Principles for Child Safe Organisations
subcategories.description: Standards to enable child safety and wellbeing across Australia.

subcategories.title: Support for survivors of child sexual abuse
subcategories.description: Where to go for help or support.

subcategories.title: Redress, compensation, litigation and apologies
subcategories.description: Information for survivors about Redress.

subcategories.title: How to make a complaint if you are a child or young person
subcategories.description: You can lodge a complaint against organisations you come into contact with.

subcategories.title: Implementing the recommendations of the Royal Commission to Institutional Responses into Child Sexual Abuse
subcategories.description: Find out how the WA Government is implementing the recommendations from the Royal Commission to Institutional Responses into Child Sexual Abuse.

subcategories.title: Oversight of child safety in Western Australia
subcategories.description: Find out how the WA Government is working hard to improve the way we work to protect children.

subcategories.title: Messages from victims and survivors
subcategories.description: ‘Message to Australia’ gave those who bravely told their story to the Royal Commission an opportunity to share a message with the Australian community about their experience and hopes for creating a safer future for children. Read their messages here.
